str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To put on, clothe (another). From en and duno; to invest with clothing.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
Rarely: stark-naked; generally: wearing only the under-garment; bare, open, manifest; mere. Of uncertain affinity; nude.
